na ca śaithilikaḥ bhavet śikṣā padeṣu

original: evaṃbhūtaṃ vastu apavadamānaḥ praṇaṣṭo bhavatyasmād dharmavinayāt /

original: yaḥ kaści] cchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tacca necchati yena śūnyam /

iyam evaṃrūpā durgṛhītā śūnyatā iti ucyate

original: tadyathā rūpādisaṃjñake yathā nirdiṣṭe vastuni rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādātmako dharmo nāsti /

atas tad rūpa ādi saṃjñakam vastu tena rūpam iti evamādi prajñapti vāda ātmanā śūnyam

yat uta tat eva rūpam iti evamādi prajñapti vāda āśrayaḥ

original: taccobhayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yaduta vastamātrañca vidyamānaṃ vastamātre ca prajñaptimātraṃ ca cāsadbhūtaṃ samāropayati /

original: iyamucyate sugṛhītā śūnyatā samyak prajñayā supratividdheti /

original: natveva rājñayā parārādhanārthaṃ parotpīḍanāṃ paravadhaṃ paravañcanāṃ vā kuryāt /
analyzed: na tvā iva rājñayā para ārādhana artham para utpīḍanām para vadham para vañcanām vā kuryāt

original: yadi ca bodhisattvaḥ śuddhāśayo bhavati dānamārabhya so 'pi sattvakārye prabhūte
analyzed: yadi ca bodhisattvaḥ śuddha āśayaḥ bhavati dānam ārabhya saḥ sattva kārye prabhūte

original: karaṇīye pratyupasthite svadehāṅgapratyaṅgayācanake ca pratyupasthite na svadehāṅgapratyaṅgānyanuprayacchati /
analyzed: karaṇīye pratyupasthite sva deha aṅga pratyaṅga yācanake ca pratyupasthite na sva deha aṅga pratyaṅgāni anuprayacchati
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hyasya bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya śuddhāśayasya punaḥ kenacitparyāyeṇedaṃ dātavyamasmai dātanyamiti bhavati cetasaḥ saṃkocaḥ /
analyzed: na hi asya bodhisattvasya dānam ārabhya śuddhāśayasya punar kenacid paryāyeṇa idam dātavyam asmai dātanyam iti bhavati cetasaḥ saṃkocaḥ

original: tasmādasau bodhisattvo yadāśayaśuddhyarthaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ sattvakāryamadhyupekṣya dadyāt so 'syāśayaḥ śuddha iti na (Dutt 82)
analyzed: tasmāt asau bodhisattvaḥ yat āśaya śuddhi artham pratyupasthitam sattva kāryam adhyupekṣya dadyāt saḥ sya āśayaḥ śuddhaḥ iti
pratyupasthitam sattva kāryam adhyupekṣya dadāti

original: na ca mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu yācanakeṣu viheṭhābhiprāyeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu svadehamaṅgavibhāgaśo dadāti /
analyzed: na ca māra kāyikeṣu deveṣu yācanakeṣu viheṭhā abhiprāyeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu sva deham aṅga vibhāgaśaḥ dadāti

original: mā haiva teṣāmadhimātrā kṣatiścopahatiśca bhaviṣyatīti yathā mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu /
analyzed: mā ha eva teṣām adhimātrā kṣatiḥ ca upahatiḥ ca bhaviṣyati iti yathā mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu
eva tad ādiṣṭeṣu sattveṣu veditavyam
na api ca unmatta kṣipta citteṣu bodhisattvaḥ sva deham aṅga vibhāgaśaḥ nuprayacchati
na hi te sva citte vasthitāḥ
na arthinaḥ mṛgayante
na anyatra vipralāpaḥ
sa teṣām a svatantra tvāt cetasaḥ tasmāt na dadāti

original: etānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayāt svadehaṃ tāvadbodhisattvaḥ paravidheyatayā vā 'ṅgapratyaṅgavibhāgaśo vārthibhyaḥ parityajati /
analyzed: etān ākārān sthāpayitvā etad viparyayāt sva deham tāvat bodhisattvaḥ para vidheya tayā vā ṅga pratyaṅga vibhāgaśaḥ vā arthibhyaḥ parityajati
evam tāvat bodhisattvasya ādhyātmikasya vastunaḥ dānam ca adānam ca veditavyam

original: bāhyātpunarvastuno bodhisattvo yāni viṣāgniśastramadyāni sattvānāmupaghātāya tāni nānuprayacchatyarthibhyaḥ ātmopaghātāya vā yācitānyarthināṃ  #
analyzed: bāhyāt punar vastunaḥ bodhisattvaḥ yāni viṣa agni śastra madyāni sattvānām upaghātāya tāni na anuprayacchati arthibhyaḥ ātma upaghātāya vā yācitāni arthinām
para upaghātāya vā

original: yāni punarviṣāgniśasramadyānyanugrahāya sattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvo dadātyarthibhya ātmano vā 'nugrahāya yācitānyarthināṃ parānugrahāya vā /
analyzed: yāni punar viṣa agni śasra madyāni anugrahāya sattvānām tāni bodhisattvaḥ dadāti arthibhyaḥ ātmanaḥ vā nugrahāya yācitāni arthinām para anugrahāya vā

original: punarna ca bodhisattvaḥ parakīyaṃ draviṇamaviśvāsyaṃ parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /
analyzed: punar na ca bodhisattvaḥ parakīyam draviṇam a viśvāsyam parebhyaḥ nuprayacchati

original: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sāñcaritreṇa paradāramupasaṃhṛtya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sāñcaritreṇa para dāram upasaṃhṛtya pareṣām anuprayacchati
na ca sa prāṇakam pāna bhojanam anuprayacchati

original: yadapi [rati]krīḍopasaṃhitamanarthopasaṃhitaṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvasya deyaṃ vastu tadapi bodhisattvo 'rthibhyo na dadāti /
analyzed: yat api rati krīḍā upasaṃhitam anartha upasaṃhitam sattvānām bodhisattvasya deyam vastu tat api bodhisattvaḥ ṛthibhyaḥ na dadāti
tat kasya hetoḥ
yadi api tat vastu teṣām citta prasāda mātrakam utpādayet bodhisattvasya antike

original: apitu vipulataramasya taddānamanarthaṃ kuryādyaddhetorasau madaṃ pramādaṃ duścaritamadhyāpadyamānaḥ kāyasya bhedādapāyeṣūpapadyate /
analyzed: apitu vipulataram asya tat dānam anartham kuryāt yad hetoḥ asau madam pramādam duścaritam adhyāpadyamānaḥ kāyasya bhedāt apāyeṣu upapadyate

original: sa cetpunastadratikrīḍādikaṃ va tu nāpāyagamanāya bhavennāpi cākuśalamūlopacayāya
analyzed: sa ced punar tat rati krīḍā ādikam tu na apāya gamanāya bhavet na api ca akuśala mūla upacayāya
kāmam tat bodhisattvaḥ tādṛśam rati krīḍā ādikam vasta citta prasāda hetoḥ anupracchet arthibhyaḥ tena api
vastunā saṃgrahāya paripākāya

original: kīdṛśaṃ punā ratikrīḍāvastu bodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśam rati krīḍā vastu bodhisattvaḥ na dadāti arthibhyaḥ
kidṛśam dadāti
tat yathā mṛga vadha śikṣām bodhisattvaḥ na dadāti

original: kṣudrayajñeṣu ca mahārambheṣu yeṣu bahavaḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃghātamāpadya jīvitādvyaparopyante /
analyzed: kṣudra yajñeṣu ca mahā ārambheṣu yeṣu bahavaḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃghātam āpadya jīvitāt vyaparopyante

original: tadrūpān yajñānna svayaṃ yajati na parairyājayati /
analyzed: tad rūpān yajñān na svayam yajati na paraiḥ yājayati
na api ca devakuleṣu paśu vadham anuprayacchati

original: na ca prabhūtaprāṇyāśritān [deśān] jalajairvā [sthalajairvā] prāṇibhiradhyuṣitāṃsteṣāṃ prāṇināmuparodhāya yācito 'nuprayacchati /
analyzed: na ca prabhūta prāṇi āśritān deśān jala jaiḥ vā sthala jaiḥ vā prāṇibhiḥ adhyuṣitān teṣām prāṇinām uparodhāya yācitaḥ nuprayacchati

original: (Dutt 83) na jālāni na yantrāṇi na jālayantraśikṣāṃ prāṇināmuparodhāya yācito 'nuprayacchati /
analyzed: na jālāni na yantrāṇi na jāla yantra śikṣām prāṇinām uparodhāya yācitaḥ nuprayacchati

original: nāpyākrośāya vadhāya bandhāya daṇḍanāya kāraṇāya śatrūṇāṃ śatrumanuprayacchati /
analyzed: na api ākrośāya vadhāya bandhāya daṇḍanāya kāraṇāya śatrūṇām śatrum anuprayacchati

original: samāsato bodhisattvo yatkiñcit parasattvotpīḍayā parasattvabādhāya sattvānāṃ ratikrīḍāvastu tatsarvaṃbodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
analyzed: samāsatas bodhisattvaḥ yat kiñcid para sattva utpīḍayā para sattva bādhāya sattvānām rati krīḍā vastu tat sarvam bodhisattvaḥ na dadāti arthibhyaḥ

original: yāni punarimāni vicitrāṇi hastyaśvarathayānavāhanāni vastrālaṅkārāṇi praṇītāni ca
analyzed: yāni punar imāni vicitrāṇi hasti aśva ratha yāna vāhanāni vastra alaṅkārāṇi praṇītāni ca
pāna bhojanāni nṛtta gīta vādita śikṣā nṛtta gīta vādita bhājanāni ca gandha mālya vilepanam

original: vicitraśca bhāṇḍopaskara udyānāni ca gṛhāṇi striyaśca paricaryāyai vividheṣu ca śilpakarmasthāneṣu
analyzed: vicitraḥ ca bhāṇḍa upaskaraḥ udyānāni ca gṛhāṇi striyaḥ ca paricaryāyai vividheṣu ca śilpa karmasthāneṣu
śikṣā iti evaṃrūpam rati krīḍā vastu bodhisattvaḥ citta prasāda hetoḥ arthibhyaḥ nuprayacchati

original: na ca bodhisattvaḥ amātrayā 'pathyaṃ vā glānāyārthine 'pi pānabhojanamanuprayacchati /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ amātrayā pathyam vā glānāya arthine pi pāna bhojanam anuprayacchati

original: na tṛpteṣu lolupajātīyeṣu sattveṣu praṇītaṃ pānabhojanamanuprayacchati /
analyzed: na tṛpteṣu lolupa jātīyeṣu sattveṣu praṇītam pāna bhojanam anuprayacchati

original: nāpi ca śokārtānāṃ sattvānāmātmodbandhanāya vā tāḍnāya vā viṣabhakṣaṇāya vā prapātapatanāya vā kāmakāraṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na api ca śoka ārtānām sattvānām ātma udbandhanāya vā tāḍnāya vā viṣa bhakṣaṇāya vā prapāta patanāya vā kāmakāram dadāti

original: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitaraṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃmarthibhyo 'nuprayacchati /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ mātā pitaram sarveṇa sarvam arthibhyaḥ nuprayacchati

original: tathāhi bodhisattvasya mātāpitaraṃ paramaguru-sthānīyamāpāyakaṃ poṣakaṃ saṃvardhakaṃ tadbodhisattvena dīrgharātraṃ śirasodvahatā na khedamāpattavyam
analyzed: tathā hi bodhisattvasya mātā pitaram parama guru sthānīyam āpāyakam poṣakam saṃvardhakam tat bodhisattvena dīrgharātram śirasā udvahatā na khedam āpattavyam

original: tayoścādhamanabandhaka sthāpanavikraye ātmā vaśyo vidheyo dātavyaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ ca ādhamana bandhakaḥ sthāpana vikraye ātmā vaśyaḥ vidheyaḥ dātavyaḥ

original: tatkathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parebhyo 'nupradātumutsaheta kutaḥ punaḥ pradadyāt /
analyzed: tat katham bodhisattvaḥ parebhyaḥ nupradātum utsaheta kutas punar pradadyāt

original: nāpi bodhisattvo rājā mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sve pṛthivīmaṇḍale sattvānāṃ saparigrahāṇāṃ parakīyaṃ putradāraṃ pareṣāmantikādācchidya pareṣāmanuprayacchati
analyzed: na api bodhisattvaḥ rājā mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sve pṛthivī maṇḍale sattvānām sa parigrahāṇām parakīyam putra dāram pareṣām antikāt ācchidya pareṣām anuprayacchati

original: nānyatra kṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā bhogamanuprayacchet /
analyzed: na anyatra kṛtsnam grāmam vā grāma pradeśam vā janapada pradeśam vā bhogam anuprayacchet
yathā mama abhūt tathā te bhavatu iti

original: na ca bodhisattvaḥ svaṃ putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaparigrahaṃ samyagasaṃjñaptamakāmakaṃ vimanaskaṃ pareṣāmarthināmanuprayacchati
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ svam putra dāram dāsī dāsa karmakara pauruṣeya parigraham samyak a saṃjñaptam akāmakam vimanaskam pareṣām arthinām anuprayacchati

original: samyak saṃjñaptamapi ca sumanaskaṃ chandajātaṃ nāmitreṣu na yakṣarākṣaseṣu na raudrakarmasu pratipādayati /
analyzed: samyak saṃjñaptam api ca sumanaskam chanda jātam na amitreṣu na yakṣa rākṣaseṣu na raudra karmasu pratipādayati

original: nāpi ca dāsabhāvāya pratipādayati putradāraṃ sukumāraṃ kulaputraṃ janam /
analyzed: na api ca dāsa bhāvāya pratipādayati putra dāram su kumāram kula putram janam

original: na ca bodhisattvo 'dhimātraparapīḍāpravṛtteṣu raudrakarmasu yācanakeṣu rājyapradānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ dhi mātra para pīḍā pravṛtteṣu raudra karmasu yācanakeṣu rājya pradānam dadāti

original: rājyādapi ca tāṃstathāvidhān pudgalāṃścyāvayati sa cet pratibalo bhavati cyāvayitum /
analyzed: rājyāt api ca tān tathāvidhān pudgalān cyāvayati sa ced pratibalaḥ bhavati cyāvayitum

original: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitrorantikādbhogānācchidya yācanakebhyaḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ mātā pitroḥ antikāt bhogān ācchidya yācanakebhyaḥ prayacchati
yathā mātā pitroḥ evam putra dāra dāsī dāsa karmakara pauruṣeyebhyaḥ

original: nāpi ca (Dutt 84) mātāpitaraṃ bādhitvā vistareṇa yāvatkarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ bādhitvā parebhyo yācanakebhyo deyavastu parityajati /
analyzed: na api ca mātā pitaram bādhitvā vistareṇa yāvat karmakara pauruṣeyam bādhitvā parebhyaḥ yācanakebhyaḥ deya vastu parityajati

original: dharmaṇa cāsāhasena bodhisattvo bhogān saṃhṛtya dānaṃ dadāti nādharmeṇa sāhasena /
analyzed: dharmaṇa ca asāhasena bodhisattvaḥ bhogān saṃhṛtya dānam dadāti na adharmeṇa sāhasena

original: na paramutpīḍyopahatya na ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane bodhisattvo vyavasthitaḥ śikṣāṃ vyatikramya kathañcit dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na param utpīḍya upahatya na ca buddhānām bhagavatām śāsane bodhisattvaḥ vyavasthitaḥ śikṣām vyatikramya kathañcid dānam dadāti

original: dānañca dadad bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto dadāti dakṣiṇīyabuddhimupasthāpya mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu guṇavatsu doṣasatsu hīneṣu tulyeṣu  #
analyzed: dānam ca dadat bodhisattvaḥ sarva sattveṣu sama cittaḥ dadāti dakṣiṇīya buddhim upasthāpya mitra amitra udāsīneṣu guṇavatsu doṣa satsu hīneṣu tulyeṣu
viśiṣṭeṣu sukhiteṣu duḥkhiteṣu ca

original: na ca bodhisattvo yathoktādyathāpratijñātādyācanakāya nyūnaṃ dāna dadāti /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ yathā uktāt yathā pratijñātāt yācanakāya nyūnam dāna dadāti
na anyatra vā adhikam vā

original: na ca bodhisattvaḥ praṇītaṃ vastu pratijñāya lūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ praṇītam vastu pratijñāya lūham pratyavaram dadāti

original: nānyatralūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ pratijñāya praṇītaṃ dadāti saṃvidyamāne praṇīte /
analyzed: na anyatra lūham pratyavaram pratijñāya praṇītam dadāti saṃvidyamāne praṇīte

original: na ca bodhisattvo vimanasko na kruddhaḥ kṣubhitamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ vimanaskaḥ na kruddhaḥ kṣubhita mānasaḥ dānam dadāti

original: nāpi ca dānaṃ dattvā nindayati punaḥ punaḥ parikīrtanatayā evaṃ caivañca tvaṃ mayā dānenānugṛhītaḥ savardhito 'bhyuddhṛto veti /
analyzed: na api ca dānam dattvā nindayati punar punar parikīrtana tayā evam ca evam ca tvam mayā dānena anugṛhītaḥ sa vardhitaḥ bhyuddhṛtaḥ vā iti

original: na ca bodhisattvo nihīnapuruṣasyāpi dānaṃ dadadapaviddhamasatkṛtyānuprayacchati prāgeva guṇavataḥ /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ nihīna puruṣasya api dānam dadat apaviddham asatkṛtya anuprayacchati prāk eva guṇavataḥ
na ca bodhisattvaḥ vividha vipratipatti sthitānām uddhatānām asaṃvṛta ātmanām

original: yācanakānāmākrośakānāṃ roṣakāṇāṃ paribhāṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattyā khinnamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: yācanakānām ākrośakānām roṣakāṇām paribhāṣakāṇām vipratipattyā khinna mānasaḥ dānam dadāti

original: nānyatra teṣāmevāntike bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā kleśāveśaprakṛtitāmavagamyānukampācittamupasthāpya dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na anyatra teṣām eva antike bodhisattvaḥ bhūyasyā mātrayā kleśa āveśa prakṛti tām avagamya anukampā cittam upasthāpya dānam dadāti
na ca asat dṛṣṭyā parāmṛṣṭam dānam dadāti

original: tadyathā mahāraudrayajñeṣu na hiṃsādānena dharmaṃ pratyeti /
analyzed: tat yathā mahāraudra yajñeṣu na hiṃsā dānena dharmam pratyeti
na api kautaka maṅgala pratisaṃyuktam dānam dadāti

original: nāpi suviśuddhenāpi sarvākāreṇa dānamātrakeṇa laukikalokottarāṃ vairāgyaviśuddhiṃ pratyeti nānyatra /
analyzed: na api su viśuddhena api sarva ākāreṇa dāna mātrakeṇa laukika lokottarām vairāgya viśuddhim pratyeti na anyatra
saṃbhāra mātraka tayā viśuddheḥ dānam dhārayati
na ca phala darśī dadāti
sarvam ca dānam anuttarāyām samyak sambodhau pariṇāmayati

original: sarvaprakārasya dānasya sarvaṃ prakāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ phalaṃ vipāke 'bhisaṃpratyayajāto bodhisattvo 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyo dānaṃ dadāti tadyathā  #
analyzed: sarva prakārasya dānasya sarvam prakāram yathābhūtam phalam vipāke para pratyayaḥ dānam dadāti tat yathā
nna daḥ balavān bhavati

original: vastrado varṇavān yānadaḥ sukhitaḥ cakṣuṣmān pradīpada ityevamādi vistareṇa veditavyam /
analyzed: vastra daḥ varṇavān yāna daḥ sukhitaḥ cakṣuṣmān pradīpa daḥ iti evamādi vistareṇa veditavyam

original: na ca bodhisattvo dāridryabhayabhīto dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ dāridrya bhaya bhītaḥ dānam dadāti
na anyatra kāruṇya abhiprāyaḥ eva

original: na ca bodhisattvo yācanakānāmapratirūpaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ yācanakānām apratirūpam dānam dadāti
tat yathā yatīnām ucchiṣṭam vā pāna bhojanam uccāra prasrāva kheṭa śiṃghāṇaka vānta virikta pūya rudhiṃra saṃsṛṣṭam
vā abhidūṣitam vā
an ākhyātam a pratisaṃveditam odana kulmāṣam utsarjana dharmī tathā
a palāṇḍu bhakṣāṇām palāṇḍu saṃmiśram palāṇḍu saṃsṛṣṭam
evam a māṃsa bhakṣāṇām
amadyapānām madya miśram madya saṃsṛṣṭam vā

original: tathā 'pratirūpe karmaṇi viniyojya bodhisattvo na pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: tathā pratirūpe karmaṇi viniyojya bodhisattvaḥ na pareṣām dānam dadāti
iti evaṃbhāgīyam apratirūpam dānam na dadāti

original: na ca punarbodhisattvo yācanakaṃ punaḥ punaryācanatayā gatapratyāgatikatayā sevāvṛttasaṃvidhānena parikliśya dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na ca punar bodhisattvaḥ yācanakam punar punar yācana tayā gatapratyāgatika tayā sevā vṛtta saṃvidhānena parikliśya dānam dadāti
na anyatra yācita mātraḥ eva

original: na ca bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaślokamiśritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvaḥ kīrti śabda śloka miśritam dānam dadāti
na ca paratas pratikāra sanniśritam na śakra tva māra tva cakravarti tva aiśvarya sanniśritam dadāti

original: yasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvaścittamanuvartitukāmo bhavati tasya ca cetpaśyatyevaṃrūpeṇāsya vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena duḥkhadaurmasyamutpatsyete
analyzed: yasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvaḥ cittam anuvartitu kāmaḥ bhavati tasya ca ced paśyati evaṃrūpeṇa asya vastu samudācāreṇa kāyika vācikena duḥkha daurmasyam utpatsyete

original: taccaduḥkhadaurmanasyamasya nākuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya saṃvartiṣyate /

original: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvastaṃ kāyikavācikaṃ vastasamudācāraṃ yatnataḥ pariharati na samudācarati /
analyzed: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ tam kāyika vācikam yatnataḥ pariharati na samudācarati

original: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ paracittaṃ yaduta parānukampāmevopādāya yena ca pareṣāṃ
analyzed: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ para cittam yat uta para anukampām eva upādāya yena ca pareṣām

original: tadanyeṣāmakuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhā[pa]nāya [na] saṃvartate
analyzed: tat anyeṣām akuśalāt sthānāt vyutthānāya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya na saṃvartate

original: sa cetpunaḥ paśyati pareṣāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ vā tadubhayorvā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya pratisaṃkhyāya samudācarati  #
analyzed: sa ced punar paśyati pareṣām tad anyeṣām vā tad ubhayoḥ vā akuśalāt sthānāt vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya pratisaṃkhyāya samudācarati

na anuvartate teṣām sattvānām cittam anukampā cittam eva upasthāpya

original: yena ca bodhisattva ātmano vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpadyamānaṃ

original: yathā duḥkhadaurmanasyamevaṃ sukhasaumanasyaṃ yathāyogaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam /

original: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ parasya krodhaparyavasthānena paryavasthitasya sammukhamavigate krodhaparyavasthāne varṇamapi bhāṣate prāgevāvarṇam
analyzed: na ca para citta anuvartī bodhisattvaḥ parasya krodha paryavasthānena paryavasthitasya sammukham avigate krodha paryavasthāne varṇam api bhāṣate prāk eva avarṇam

original: asyāḥ khalu bodhisattvānāṃ dhṛtibalādhānatāyāḥ samāsataḥ pañcavidhamadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: asyāḥ khalu bodhisattvānām dhṛti bala ādhāna tāyāḥ samāsatas pañcavidham adhiṣṭhānam veditavyam
vicitraḥ saṃsāra duḥkha upanipātaḥ vicitrā vineya kṛtā vipratipattiḥ
dīrghakālikaḥ sattvānām arthe saṃsāra abhyupagamaḥ
paravādibhiḥ ākalana anuyogaḥ mahatyām ca pariṣadi dharma deśanā
sarva bodhi sattva śikṣā pada abhyupagamaḥ
udāra gaṃbhīra dharma śravaṇam ca pañcamam adhiṣṭhānam veditavyam

original: tatra pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairaparikhinnamānasatā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasamyak prayogeṣu veditavyā /
analyzed: tatra pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ aparikhinna mānasa tā bodhisattvānām sarva samyak prayogeṣu veditavyā

original: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā balavān bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā balavān bhavati yena na parikhidyate

original: punaḥ saivākhinnamānasatā 'nena punaḥ punarabhyastā bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
analyzed: punar sā eva akhinna mānasa tā nena punar punar abhyastā bhavati yena na parikhidyate

original: punarupāyaparigṛhītenavīryāṃrambheṇa prayukto bhavati yena paurvāparyeṇa viśeṣaṃ samanupaśyan na parikhidyate /
analyzed: punar upāya parigṛhītena vīrya āṃrambheṇa prayuktaḥ bhavati yena paurvāparyeṇa viśeṣam samanupaśyan na parikhidyate

original: tīvreṇa ca prajñāpratisaṃkhyānabalena samanvāgato bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
analyzed: tīvreṇa ca prajñā pratisaṃkhyāna balena samanvāgataḥ bhavati yena na parikhidyate

original: tīvrañcāsya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kāruṇyacittamanukampācittaṃ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
analyzed: tīvram ca asya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kāruṇya cittam anukampā cittam satata samitam pratyupasthitam bhavati yena na parikhidyate
tatra katamā bodhisattvasya śāstra jñayā

original: iha bodhisattvena pañcavidhāsthānānyārabhya nāmakāya-padakāya-vyañjanakāya-pratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ parataḥ sugṛhīto bhavati /
analyzed: iha bodhisattvena pañcavidha āsthānāni ārabhya nāmakāya pada kāya vyañjana kāya pratisaṃyuktaḥ dharmaḥ paratas su gṛhītaḥ bhavati
vacasā ca su paricitaḥ

original: tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthaḥ parato vā suśruto bhavati /
analyzed: tasya eva ca dharmasya arthaḥ paratas vā su śrutaḥ bhavati
svayam vā su vicintitaḥ bhavati su abhyūhitaḥ

original: evamapi ca dharmajñenārthajñena bodhisattvena tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthasyāvismaraṇāya
analyzed: evam api ca dharma jñena artha jñena bodhisattvena tasya eva ca dharmasya arthasya a vismaraṇāya
prayogaḥ nirākṛtaḥ bhavati anyasya ca abhinavasya abhinavasya uttarottarasya dharma artha viśeṣasya jñānāya

original: śrutacintāniṣṭhāgatenāpi cānena kālāntarakṛtaḥ paripākaḥ prasādaḥ tasmindharme cārthe ca pratilabdho bhavati /
analyzed: śruta cintā niṣṭhā gatena api ca anena kāla antara kṛtaḥ paripākaḥ prasādaḥ tasmin dharme ca arthe ca pratilabdhaḥ bhavati

original: ebhirākārairbodhisattvasyāpramāṇā paripūrṇā aviparītā ca śāstrajñatā veditavyā /
analyzed: ebhiḥ ākāraiḥ bodhisattvasya apramāṇā paripūrṇā aviparītā ca śāstra jña tā veditavyā
tatra katamā bodhisattvasya loka jña tā

original: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhyaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti-kṛcchraṃ vatāyaṃ loka
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattva lokam ārabhya evam yathābhūtam prajānāti kṛcchram vata ayam loka

original: āpanno yaduta jāyate 'pi jīryate 'pi mriyate 'pi cyavatepyupapadyatepyatha ca punaramī
analyzed: āpannaḥ yat uta jāyate pi jīryate pi mriyate pi cyavate pi upapadyate pi atha ca punar amī
sattvāḥ jarā maraṇasya uttari niḥsaraṇam yathābhūtam na prajānanti iti
punar sattva lokasya eva kaṣāya utsada kāla tām ca yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: niṣkaṣāyānutsadakaṣāyakālatāñca yaduta pañcakaṣāyānārabhya āyuṣkaṣāyaṃ [sattvakaṣāyaṃ] kleśakaṣāyaṃ kalpakaṣāyam /
analyzed: niṣkaṣāya anutsada kaṣāya kālatām ca yat uta pañca kaṣāyān ārabhya āyuḥ kaṣāyam sattva kaṣāyam kleśa kaṣāyam kalpa kaṣāyam

original: tadyathā etarhyalpaṃ jīvitaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yaściraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśatam /
analyzed: tat yathā etarhi alpam jīvitam manuṣyāṇām yaḥ ciram jīvati sa varṣa śatam

original: tadyathaitarhi sattvā yadbhūyasā [a]mātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā na kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyakā
analyzed: tat yathā etarhi sattvāḥ yat bhūyasā a mātṛ jñāḥ a pitṛ jñāḥ a śrāmaṇyāḥ a brāhmaṇyāḥ na kula jyeṣṭha apacāyakā

original: nārthakarā na kṛtyakarā na iha loke na paraloke avadye bhayadarśino na dānāni dadati
analyzed: na artha karāḥ na kṛtya karāḥ na iha loke na para loke avadye bhaya darśinaḥ na dānāni dadati

original: na puṇyāni kurvanti nopavāsamupavasanti na śīlaṃ samādāya vartante /
analyzed: na puṇyāni kurvanti na upavāsam upavasanti na śīlam samādāya vartante
tat yathā etarhi yat bhūyasā dharma rāgāḥ ca viṣama lobhāḥ ca śastra ādāna daṇḍa ādāna kalaha bhaṇḍana vigraha vivāda śāṭhya vañcana nikṛti mṛṣāvāda mithyādharma saṃgṛhītā
anekavidhāḥ pāpakāḥ akuśalāḥ dharmāḥ prajñāyante

original: tadyathaitarhi saddharmapralopāya saddharmāntardhānāya saddharmapratirūpakāṇi prabhūtāni prādurbhūtāni mithyādharmārtha-santīraṇāpūrvikāṇi
analyzed: tat yathā etarhi saddharma pralopāya saddharma antardhānāya saddharma pratirūpakāṇi prabhūtāni prādurbhūtāni mithyādharma artha santīraṇā pūrvikāṇi
tat yathā etarhi durbhikṣa antara kalpa samāsannāni pracurāṇi durbhikṣāṇi upalabhyante
roga antara kalpa samāsannāḥ ca rogāḥ ca pracurāḥ upalabhyante
śastra antara kalpa samāsannāḥ ca pracurāḥ śastrakāḥ prāṇa atipātāḥ upalabhyante
na tu tathā pūrvam āsīt

original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhya lokajño bhavati /
analyzed: evam hi bodhisattvaḥ sattva lokam ārabhya loka jñaḥ bhavati

original: punarbodhisattvo bhājanalokasya saṃvartavivartaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathā bhājanalokaḥ saṃvartate vivartate ca /

original: lokanirodhagāminīñca pratipadaṃ lokasyāsvādamādīnavañca niḥsaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
analyzed: loka nirodha gāminīm ca pratipadam lokasya āsvādam ādīnavam ca niḥsaraṇam ca yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: punarbodhisattvaḥ cakṣuryāvanmanaḥ arūpiṇaśca skandhāṃścāturmahābhautikañca puruṣasya samucchrayametāvanmanuṣyatvamityucyate /
analyzed: punar bodhisattvaḥ cakṣuḥ yāvat manaḥ arūpiṇaḥ ca skandhān cāturmahābhautikam ca puruṣasya samucchrayam etāvat manuṣya tvam iti ucyate

original: tatra yā saṃjñā ātmā vā sattvo veti saṃjñāmātramevaitat /
analyzed: tatra yā saṃjñā ātmā vā sattvaḥ vā iti saṃjñā mātram eva etat

original: tatra yā pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmi yāvanmanasā dharmāna vijānāmīti pratijñāmātrameva tat /
analyzed: tatra yā pratijñā aham cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmi yāvat manasā dharmān vijānāmi iti pratijñā mātram eva tat

original: tatra yo vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evaṃjātīya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃ
analyzed: tatra yaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti api saḥ āyuṣmān evaṃnāmā evaṃjātīyaḥ evaṃgotraḥ evam āhāraḥ evam

original: sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīryāyurevaṃ cirasthitika evamāyuṣparyanta iti vyavahāramātramevaitaditi
analyzed: sukha duḥkha pratisaṃvedī evam dīrya āyuḥ evam cirasthitikaḥ evam āyuṣparyantaḥ iti vyavahāra mātram eva etat iti
sarvam yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: iti hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokapravṛttiñca bhājanalokapravṛttiñca aṣṭākāralokopaparīkṣārthañca [lokaparamārthaṃ ca] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
analyzed: iti hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sattva loka pravṛttim ca bhājana loka pravṛttim ca aṣṭa ākāra loka upaparīkṣā artham ca loka parama artham ca yathābhūtam prajānāti
tasmāt loka jñā eti ucyate

original: punarbodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇaprativiśiṣṭatarakaṃ dṛṣṭvā samyak saṃbhāṣayatyutthāyāsanenopanimantrayati (Dutt 174)
analyzed: punar bodhisattvaḥ vṛddha tarakam guṇa prativiśiṣṭa tarakam dṛṣṭvā samyak saṃbhāṣayati utthāya āsanena upanimantrayati
abhivādana vandana pratyutthāna añjali sāmīcīkarma pravartayati

original: tulyaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā samyagālapati pratisamodayati ślakṣṇairmadhurairvacanapathaiḥ /
analyzed: tulyam vā punar vayasā guṇaiḥ ca dṛṣṭvā samyak ālapati pratisamodayati ślakṣṇaiḥ madhuraiḥ vacana pathaiḥ
na ca anena saha mānam āśritya ātmāna paritulayati

original: hīnaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā śaktyā guṇādhānamārabhya protsāhayati /
analyzed: hīnam vā punar vayasā guṇaiḥ ca dṛṣṭvā śaktyā guṇa ādhānam ārabhya protsāhayati
bhūtam ca asya guṇam su alpam api udbhāvayati
bhūtam ca doṣam praticchādayati
na vivṛṇoti yena asya syāt maṃku bhāvaḥ
na ca enam avamanyate

original: nāpyarthikaṃ kenaciddharmāmiṣeṇa taṃ jñātvā vimukho bhavati bhṛkuṭīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: nā api arthikam kenacid dharma āmiṣeṇa tam jñātvā vimukhaḥ bhavati bhṛkuṭīkṛtaḥ
na api ca enam skhalite vahasati
na api vinipatitam paribhavati

original: tathā sarveṣāmeva hīnatulyaviśiṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvābhibhāṣī ca bhavati /
analyzed: tathā sarveṣām eva hīna tulya viśiṣṭānām sattvānām pūrva abhibhāṣī ca bhavati

original: ehi svāgatavādī samyak pratiśāmakaśca samyagdharmāmiṣābhyāṃ yathāśaktyā saṃgrāhakaśca /
analyzed: ehi svāgata vādī samyak pratiśāmakaḥ ca samyagdharma āmiṣābhyām yathāśaktyā saṃgrāhakaḥ ca

original: nāpi ca sattveṣu kuṭilagāmbhīryopeto bhavati na garvitaḥ kenacidevocchrayaviśeṣeṇa /
analyzed: na api ca sattveṣu kuṭila gāmbhīrya upetaḥ bhavati na garvitaḥ kenacid evā ucchraya viśeṣeṇa

original: yathopāttaṃ sattvaṃ sarvopakaraṇairapi nādhyupekṣate glānaṃ vā svasthaṃ vā ānulomikena ca kāyavākkarmaṇā /
analyzed: yathā upāttam sattvam sarva upakaraṇaiḥ api na adhyupekṣate glānam vā svastham vā ānulomikena ca kāya vāc karmaṇā

original: yathā saṃstutaṃ tathaivāsaṃstutaṃ sarvaṃ mitrasakhā ca bhavati vigatapratyarthikaḥ /

iha bodhisattvaḥ mithyā māsa upavāsa anaśana ādi adhimuktānām sattvānām ārya aṣṭāṅgam upavāsam vyapadiśati
tasmāt vicchandayati kṛcchrāt aniṣṭa phalāt upavāsāt
tasmin akṛcchra samādāne mahā phale ca upavāse samādāpayati
tathā ātma klamatha yogam anuyuktānām mokṣa kāmānām mithyā prayuktānām sattvānām
madhyamām pratipadam anta dvaya vigatām vyapadiśati tasyām ca avatārayati
tathā svarga kāmānām sattvānām mithyā prayuktānām agni praveśa a taṭa prapātāḥ naśana sthāna ādibhiḥ

original: samyagdhyānaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya cāyatyāṃ akṛchreṇa sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena
analyzed: samyak dhyānam dṛṣṭadharma sukha vihārāya ca āyatyām akṛchreṇa saha eva sukhena saha saumanasyena
svarga upapattaye vyapadiśati
punar vaidika mantra uddeśa svādhyāya śuddhi niṣṭhā gamana adhimuktān buddha vacana uddeśa svādhyāya kriyāyām artha cintāyām ca samādāpayati

original: punargambhīrāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāndharmān tathā tathā uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati yathā pare śrutvā tīvrañca saṃvegamutpādayanti  #
analyzed: punar gambhīrān tathāgata bhāṣitān śūnyatā pratisaṃyuktān dharmān tathā tathā uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati yathā pare śrutvā tīvram ca saṃvegam utpādayanti  /
tīvram ca prasādam

original: tadekakṣaṇikamapi saṃvegaprasādasahagataṃ cittaṃ vipula[kuśamūla]saṃgrahe saṃkhyāṃ gacchati prāgeva prābandhikam /
analyzed: tat eka kṣaṇikam api saṃvega prasāda sahagatam cittam vipula kuśa mūla saṃgrahe saṃkhyām gacchati prāk eva prābandhikam

original: punarbodhisattvo yāni kānicinmālyāni gandhajātāni ca loke vividhāni pravarāṇi praṇītāni
analyzed: punar bodhisattvaḥ yāni kānicid mālyāni gandha jātāni ca loke vividhāni pravarāṇi praṇītāni
taiḥ prasāda sahagatena adhyāśayena buddha dharma saṃgha tri ratna pūjām adhimucyate parān ca adhimocayati daśasu dikṣu

original: punaḥ sarvā diśastenaiva prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena spharitvā sarvāṃ triratnapūjāmabhyanumodate parāṃścābhyanumodayati /
analyzed: punar sarvāḥ diśaḥ tena eva prasāda sahagatena adhyāśayena spharitvā sarvām triratna pūjām abhyanumodate parān ca abhyanumodayati

original: punarbuddhānusmṛtiṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayati pareṣāñca samādāpayati dharmānusmṛtiṃ saṃghānusmṛtiṃ yāvaddevatānusmṛtim /
analyzed: punar buddha anusmṛtim satata samitam bhāvayati pareṣām ca samādāpayati dharma anusmṛtim saṃgha anusmṛtim yāvat devatā anusmṛtim

original: punarmanojalpaistriratna-namaskriyayā abandhyaṃ kālaṃ karoti kārayati ca /
analyzed: punar manaḥ jalpaiḥ triratna namaskriyayā abandhyam kālam karoti kārayati ca
punar sarva sattvānām sarva puṇyam anumodate anumodayati ca
punar sarva sattvānām vipula karuṇā anupraviṣṭena adhyāśayena sarva duḥkham ātmani saṃpratīcchati
tatra eva param samādāpayati

original: punaratītapratyutpannāni sarva-skhalitāni sarvavyatikramāṃśca kalyāṇena śikṣākāmānugatena cetasā sarvadikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike pratideśayati
analyzed: punar atīta pratyutpannāni sarva skhalitāni sarva vyatikramān ca kalyāṇena śikṣā kāma anugatena cetasā sarva dikṣu buddhānām bhagavatām antike pratideśayati
tatra eva ca parān samādāpayati

original: tasyaivamabhīkṣṇaṃ skhalitaṃ pratideśayataḥ sarvakarmāvaraṇebhyo vimokṣo bhavatyalpakṛcchreṇa /
analyzed: tasya evam abhīkṣṇam skhalitam pratideśayataḥ sarva karma āvaraṇebhyaḥ vimokṣaḥ bhavati alpa kṛcchreṇa

original: punaḥ prabhūtairvicitraiśca nirmāṇaiḥ sarvadikṣu buddhadharmasaṃghādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvādhiṣṭhānañcāprameyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśiprāptaḥ  #
analyzed: punar prabhūtaiḥ vicitraiḥ ca nirmāṇaiḥ sarva dikṣu buddha dharma saṃgha adhiṣṭhānam sattva adhiṣṭhānam ca aprameyam bodhisattvaḥ ṛddhimān cetaḥ vaśi prāptaḥ
puṇya parigraham karoti
punar bodhisattvaḥ maitrīm karuṇām muditām upekṣām bhāvayati
tatra eva ca param samādāpayati

original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvo 'lpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyaprameyaphalāni kuśalamūlānyabhinirharati samudānayati /
analyzed: evam hi bodhisattvaḥ lpa kṛcchreṇa vipulāni aprameya phalāni kuśala mūlāni abhinirharati samudānayati
katham ca bodhisattvaḥ pratihatānām ca sattvānām pratighātam apanayati
madhyasthān ca avatārayati
avatīrṇān ca paripācayati
parikvān ca vimocayati

original: (Dutt 180) atrāpi bodhisattvasya caturvidhasyāpyasya sattvārthasyābhiniṣpattaye samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidha evopāyo veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: atra api bodhisattvasya caturvidhasya api asya sattva arthasya abhiniṣpattaye samāsatas ṣaḍvidhaḥ eva upāyaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: ānulomiko vibandhasthāyī visabhāgāśayaḥ avaṣṭambhajaḥ kṛtaprakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaśca ṣaṣṭha upāyaḥ /
analyzed: ānulomikaḥ vibandha sthāyī visa bhāga āśayaḥ avaṣṭambha jaḥ kṛta prakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaḥ ca ṣaṣṭhaḥ upāyaḥ
tatra ayam bodhisattvasya ānulomikaḥ upāyaḥ

original: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva tāvad yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāmo bhavati teṣāṃ
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvam eva tāvat yeṣām sattvānām dharmam deśayitu kāmaḥ bhavati teṣām
ślakṣṇaiḥ madhuraiḥ kāya vāc samudācāraiḥ upapradāna anuvṛtti samudācāraiḥ ca ātma gatam teṣām
pratighātam apanayati
pratighātam apanīya prema gaurava janayati
prema gauravam janayitvā dharme rthi tvam janayati
tatas eṣām paścāt dharmam deśayati

original: tañca punardharmaṃ yathārhaṃ supraveśaṃ gamakaṃ kālenānupūrvamaviparītamarthopasaṃhitañca deśayati /
analyzed: tat ca punar dharmam yathārham su praveśam gamakam kālena anupūrvam aviparītam artha upasaṃhitam ca deśayati
vimarda sahiṣṇuḥ ca bhavati

original: sattvavinaye paramayā ca kartukāmatayā anukampācittena samanvāgato bhavati /
analyzed: sattva vinaye paramayā ca kartu kāma tayā anukampā cittena samanvāgataḥ bhavati

original: sa ṛddhyā cittādeśanayā yuktarūpayā dharmadeśanayā paraṃ vā 'dhyeṣya vicitrairvā prabhūtaiśca nirmitaiḥ sattvānvinayati /
analyzed: saḥ ṛddhyā citta ādeśanayā yukta rūpayā dharma deśanayā param vā dhyeṣya vicitraiḥ vā prabhūtaiḥ ca nirmitaiḥ sattvān vinayati
saṃkṣiptānām ca artha upasaṃhitānām śāstrāṇām pravistaraṇa tayā ati vistṛtānām ca abhisaṃkṣepaṇa tayā

original: tathā uddeśadānena anusmaraṇaparipṛcchādānena dhṛtānāñcodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ samyagarthavivaraṇatayā
analyzed: tathā uddeśa dānena anusmaraṇa paripṛcchā dānena dhṛtānām ca udgṛhītānām ca dharmāṇām samyak artha vivaraṇa tayā
sarva ālambana samādhi avatāra mukha iṣu ca ānulomikyā avavāda anusāsanyā sattvān anugṛhṇāti sattvānām artham ācarati

original: ye ca sattvā gambhīrāṇāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ sūtrāntānāmābhiprāyikaṃ
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ gambhīrāṇām tathāgata bhāṣitānām śūnyatā pratisaṃyuktānām sūtrāntānām ābhiprāyikam

original: tathāgatānāmarthamavijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti nirvastukatāmanutpannāniruddhatāmā
analyzed: tathāgatānām artham a vijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāva tām dharmāṇām abhivadanti nirvastuka tām anutpanna aniruddha tām ā
kāśa sama tām māyā svapna upama tām dharmāṇām abhivadanti teṣām yathāvat artham a vijñāya utrasta mānasāḥ

original: tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratikṣipanti naite tathāgatabhāṣitā iti /
analyzed: tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvam pratikṣipanti na ete tathāgata bhāṣitāḥ iti

original: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ sa bodhisattvaḥ ānulomikenopāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ tathāgatābhiprāyikamarthaṃ yathāvadanulomayati /
analyzed: teṣām api sattvānām sa bodhisattvaḥ ānulomikena upāya kauśalyena teṣām sūtrāntānām tathāgata ābhiprāyikam artham yathāvat anulomayati
tān ca sattvān grāhayati
evam ca punar anulomayati

original: yathā neme dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante api tvabhilāpātmakaḥ svabhāva eṣāṃ nāsti teneme niḥsvabhāvā ityucyante /
analyzed: yathā na ime dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvam na saṃvidyante api tu abhilāpa ātmakaḥ svabhāvaḥ eṣām na asti tena ime niḥsvabhāvāḥ iti ucyante

original: yadyapyetavabhilāpyavastu vidyate yadāśrityābhilāpāḥ pravartante tadapi yairabhilāpairyat svabhāvamabhilapyate tadapi na tatsvabhāva paramārthataḥ
analyzed: yadi api etau abhilāpya vastu vidyate yat āśritya abhilāpāḥ pravartante tat api yaiḥ abhilāpaiḥ yat svabhāvam abhilapyate tat api na tad svabhāva paramārthataḥ

original: tasmānnirvastukā ityucyante evañca sati te 'bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvā dharmāṇāmādita eva sarveṇa (Dutt 181)
analyzed: tasmāt nirvastukāḥ iti ucyante evañca sati te bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvāḥ dharmāṇām āditas eva sarveṇa
sarvam na saṃvidyante

original: te kimutpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmādanutpannā aniruddhā ityucyante /
analyzed: te kim utpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmāt anutpannāḥ aniruddhāḥ iti ucyante

original: tadyathā cākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpakarmāṇi copalabhyante /
analyzed: tat yathā ca ākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpa karmāṇi ca upalabhyante

original: sarveṣāñca teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ rūpakarmaṇāṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: sarveṣām ca teṣām rūpāṇām rūpa karmaṇām ca avakāśam dadāti
tat ākāśam gamana āgamana sthāna utpatana nipatana ākuñcana prasāraṇa ādīnām

original: yadā ca punastad rūpaṃ tāni ca rūpakarmāṇyapanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti /
analyzed: yadā ca punar tat rūpam tāni ca rūpa karmāṇi apanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpa abhāva mātra ātmakam eva pariśuddham ākāśam khyāti

original: evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante /
analyzed: evam tasmin ākāśa sthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividha abhilāpa kṛtāḥ saṃjñāḥ vikalpāḥ prapañca saṃjñā anugatāḥ rūpa karma sthānīyāḥ pravartante

original: sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ  #
analyzed: sarveṣām ca teṣām abhilāpa kṛtānām saṃjñā vikalpānām prapañca saṃjñā anugatānām citra rūpa karma sthānīyānām tat nirabhilāpyam vastu ākāśa sthānīyam avakāśam
dadāti
yadā ca punar bodhisattvaiḥ jñānena āryeṇa te bhilāpa samutthitāḥ mithyā saṃjñā vikalpāḥ

original: prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ
analyzed: prapañca saṃjñā anugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvam apanītāḥ bhavanti tadā teṣām bodhisattvānām paramāryāṇām
tena ārya jñānena tat nirabhilāpyam vastu sarva abhilāpya svabhāva abhāva mātram ākāśa upamam
pariśuddham khyāti

original: na ca tasmāt paramanyaṃ svabhāvamasya mṛgayante /
analyzed: na ca tasmāt param anyam svabhāvam asya mṛgayante
tasmāt dharmāḥ ākāśa samāḥ iti ucyante

original: tadyathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathāsti /
analyzed: tat yathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathā asti

original: na ca punaḥ sarveṇaiva sarvaṃ nāsti tanmāyākṛtam /
analyzed: na ca punar sarveṇa eva sarvam na asti tat māyā kṛtam

original: evaṃ na caite dharmā yathaivābhilāpasaṃstavavaśena khyānti bālānāṃ tathaiva saṃvidyante /
analyzed: evam na ca ete dharmāḥ yathā eva abhilāpa saṃstava vaśena khyānti bālānām tathā eva saṃvidyante

original: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante pāramārthika-nirabhilāpyātmanā /
analyzed: na ca punar sarveṇa sarvam na saṃvidyante pāramārthika nirabhilāpya ātmanā

original: te cānena nayapraveśena na santo nāsanta ityadvayā māyāvat /
analyzed: te ca anena naya praveśena na santaḥ na asantaḥ iti advayāḥ māyā vat
tasmāt māyā upamāḥ iti ucyante

original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāddharmadhātorna kiñcidutkṣipati na ca kiñcit pratikṣipati nonī-karoti nādhikaṃ karoti na vināśayati /
analyzed: evam hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāt dharmadhātoḥ na kiñcid utkṣipati na ca kiñcid pratikṣipati na ūnīkaroti na adhikam karoti na vināśayati
bhūtam ca bhūtataḥ prajānāti
tathā eva ca saṃprakāśayati
ayam bodhisattvasya ānulomikaḥ upāyaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya vibandhasthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvo bhojanapānādi-daśa-kāyādipariṣkārārthikānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] vipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate
analyzed: tatra katamaḥ bodhisattvasya vibandha sthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvaḥ bhojana pāna ādi daśa kāya ādi pariṣkāra arthikānām sattvānām vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyā vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvatsacecchīlaṃ
analyzed: sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ bhavatha iti pitṛ jñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvat saced śīlam

original: samādāya vartadhve evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhojanapānādīn kāyapariṣkārānyāvadarthamanupradāsyāmi /
analyzed: samādāya vartadhve evam aham yuṣmākam bhojana pāna ādīn kāya pariṣkārān yāvadartham anupradāsyāmi
anyathā na dāsyāmi iti
tathā kṣetra vastu gṛha vastu āpaṇa vastu rājya vastu deśa vastu dhana vastu dhānya vastu arthikānām
tathā śilpa karma sthāna vidyā arthikānām tathā tena saha sakhya arthikānām āvāha vivāha arthikānām ā bhakṣaṇa saṃbhakṣaṇa arthikānām
kṛtya sahāya arthikānām ca sattvānām kārya vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vistareṇa yāvatkṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat /
analyzed: evam aham yuṣmākam vistareṇa yāvat kṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvam gamiṣyāmi sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ bhavatha iti pūrvavat
punar bodhisattvaḥ aparādhiṣu duṣiṣu apakāriṣu sattveṣu paraiḥ vadha bandhana chedana tāḍana kutsana tarjana pravāsanāya upātteṣu ādhamana bandhana vikrayāya
ca upātteṣu vipratibandhe na avatiṣṭhate śaktaḥ pratibalaḥ

original: sa cenmātṛjñāḥ [pitṛjñā] bhavatheti vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyasanādvimocayiṣyāmīti /
analyzed: sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ pitṛ jñāḥ bhavatha iti vistareṇa pūrvavat evam aham bhavataḥ smāt vyasanāt vimocayiṣyāmi iti
punar bodhisattvaḥ rāja caura udaka agni manuṣya amanuṣya ājīvikā śloka ādi bhaya bhītānām sattvānām vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat vistareṇaivamahaṃ bhavato 'smādbhayāt paritrāsyāmīti /
analyzed: sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ bhavatha iti pūrvavat vistareṇa evam aham bhavataḥ smāt bhayāt paritrāsyāmi iti
punar bodhisattvaḥ priya samāgama kāmānām vā apriya viyoga kāmānām ca sattvānām vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavatāṃ priyasamāgamamapriyavinābhāvaṃ copasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
analyzed: sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evam aham bhavatām priya samāgamam apriya vinābhāvam ca upasaṃhariṣyāmi iti
punar bodhisattvaḥ ābādhikānām sattvānām vyādhitānām vipratibandhena avatiṣṭhate

original: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyādhiduḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
analyzed: sa ced mātṛ jñāḥ bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evam aham bhavataḥ smāt vyādhi duḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmi iti

original: te ca sattvāḥ evaṃ vibandhāvasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghuladhveva tasmin kuśalasamādāne pāpaprahāṇe ca yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā bhavanti /
analyzed: te ca sattvāḥ evam vibandha avasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghu ladhu eva tasmin kuśala samādāne pāpa prahāṇe ca yathākāmam karaṇīyāḥ bhavanti
ayam bodhisattvasya vibandha sthāyī upāyaḥ iti ucyate

original: ye punaḥ sattvā evaṃ vibandhasthāyino bodhisattvasya yathāparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na
analyzed: ye punar sattvāḥ evam vibandha sthāyinaḥ bodhisattvasya yathā parikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na

original: laghu-laghveva yathākāmaṃ pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvo yathā parikīrtitairvastubhirarthikānāṃ

original: vistaranirdeśaḥ punaryathāsūtraṃ tadyathā daśabhūmike prabhākaryāṃ bhūmau /

original: prabhāve ca yatra pūrvavihāre śatasahasraguṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ tatrāsmin koṭisamākhyātaṃ veditavyam /

dharma āloka praveśa niṣpattim pratilābhataḥ ca jñāna paripācanataḥ ca bodhi pakṣya dharma niṣevaṇataḥ ca

original: pratyupannaduḥkhātmakatāṃ hetu[ta]ścānāgataduḥkhaprabhāvatāṃ hetukṣayāt [tat]kṣayānutpāda[na]tāṃ tatprahāṇopāyaniṣevaṇatāṃ cārabhya yathā deśyate

anya manasikāra apagataḥ
